name: OCKAnyTaskQuery
desc: A protocol required for task queries, which customizes and sorts task data query results.

items.name: init(OCKAnyTaskQuery)
items.desc: Creates a new task query from a specific query.

items.name: var carePlanIDs: [String]
items.desc: An array of care plan identifiers you can use to match tasks in the query-returned results.

items.name: var sortDescriptors: [OCKTaskSortDescriptor]
items.desc: The order in which you want to sort the query results.
